headline: Ross Stores’s Q2 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Ross Stores’ second quarter results were well received by the market, reflecting broad-based improvements in sales trends across most product categories and regions. Management cited particular strength in cosmetics and noted that both the Ross and dd’s DISCOUNTS chains saw growth in both store traffic and basket size. CEO James Conroy emphasized, “We were pleased to see the improved trend at the end of the quarter, particularly with the early sales performance related to the back-to-school sell
